jathika saukhya sathiya nimiththen janathawa danuwath kirime pagamanak ha widi natya dakmak rambaukkana di pasugiyada pawathwini.kagalla pradeshiya saukhya sewa karyalaye anugrahayen rambaukkana pradeshiya lekam karyalaya, polisiya, pradeshiya sabhawa ha saukhya waidya karyalaya ekwa me wadasatahana sanwidhanaya kara thibini.rambaukkana pradeshiya lekam kottasayen dengu rogin 208 denaku me wana wita handunagena athi athara , marana 05k wartha wi thibe.rambaukkana pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi athula handagama, pradeshiya lekam mohan wijerathna, rambaukkana polis sthanadhipathi sanjiwa perera, kagalla pradeshiya saukhya sewa adhyaksha waidya gamini senewirathna yana mahathwaru me pagamanata ekwuha..

koti thrasthawadinge meheyawima matha udghoshanayaka yedunu indiyawe drawida munnethra kalahagam pakshaye nayaka gopalaswami hewath wayiko athulu dedahasakata adhika pirisak indiya polisiya eeye (8) athadanguwata gena thibe.wayiko athulu aadhara karuwan pirisa indiya agamathi karyalaya watala eyata kada wadimata uthsaha gath awasthawedi athadanguwata gath bawa nawadilli hi shri lanka mahakomasaris karyala thorathuru anawaranaya kaleya.jathyanthara koti jalaye awashyathawa matha indiyawe sthana kihipayaka wayikoge hithawathun wisin eeye (08) udghoshana saha wirodhatha pawathwa atha.me udghoshanawalata sahabhagi wu piris koti sanwidhanaye dhaja athathiwa wirodhathawe niyali thibe.indiyawe chennayi nuwara pihiti lanka banku shakhawatada pereda (7) kada wadi athi pirisak bankuwata alabhahani kara niladharin dedenekuta pahara di palagos thibini.mema pahara dimada koti sanwidhanaye awashyathawa paridi sidukara athi bawata merata buddhi ansha wetha me wanawita thorathuru labi atha..
